message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product. Can you consider this price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to sell it to you for $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $115.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider selling it to me for $108?
I understand that $108 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell it to you for $112.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider selling it to me for $109?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell it to you for $114.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider selling it to me for $111?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell it to you for $116.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $112, but that's the maximum I can offer. Can you consider selling it to me for that price?
